videos.title: Prairie Burn 100 Gravel Bike Ride June 11th in Grinnell
videos.description: Tim Ellsworth, Imagine Grinnell Board Chair, stops by (with his bike) to talk about the Prairie Burn 100 Gravel Bicycle Ride fundraiser Saturday June 11, 2022.
videos.transcript:
live from the carl chevrolet studios in
west des moines this is iowa live
welcome back to the program everybody
how about we learn about a bike ride
that you might not have heard of before
happening over in grinnell that you just
might want to check out tim ellsworth is
here he's the imagine grinnell board
chair and want to talk about the prairie
burn 100 first thank you for making the

no

now talk how about that is that cool or
what now i'll tell you
what you travel on because uh the routes

on the wind so these are gravel rides
yes 100 almost 100 percent we get out of
town right on gravel we try to have all
road bikes you know they have a little
bit bigger tires um just so that they're
a little bit more
comfortable on gravel travel changes
every single day so there's always a new
challenge all right let's talk about the
safety aspect of that too because you
and i were talking about that earlier
how safe are gravel roads to travel you
can ride on gravel two three hours
sometimes and see one car so you can go
for that aspect so you don't have the
the target on your bike like you do on
the road we tried to stay away from the
busy gravel roads you know at night time
and and take some take a route that's
just a little less traveled but we think
they're much safer
than riding on the road and you there's
just so many more of them than riding on
the trails all right now i also you
talked about imagine grinnell one of the
things you have recently done too since
it's a ratio i had a chance to plant a
whole bunch of trees haven't you we're
up to i think 73 thousand dollars worth
of trees money raised and trees planted
we even started a tree core to help take

the parks and rec to
water these trees take care of them so
it's a three-year initiative and and
we're planting a lot of trees and so the
prairie burn 100 is going to help fund
uh you know some of these initiatives
100 of monies coming into prairie burn
um ride go to imagine grinnell it's all
volunteer run and so it helps all these
initiatives right now tell us about the
ride that's happening and when it's
happening june 11th saturday um there's
a 25 50 and 100 mile route
we route everybody back through central
park our newly renovated central park
that that is just great we've got food

from nine to twelve
smoothie maker
yoga in the park our art in the park
and so people will choose 25 50 or 100
miles and they might be on their bike
for a couple of hours to 10 hours wow
and this is uh what year are you into
this now it's about our fourth year okay
kovid you know made us skip one but it's
it's something that we'll get 150 to 200
riders right and if people want to get
more information about this of how they
can maybe get signed up for this because
grinnell's not that far away it might be
a good good little journey you can go
it's a great place to spend the day
biker edge.org and then

another place where you can go and find

there 15 20 minutes on the crunchy

difference it kind of kind of centers

everybody get out enjoy the rest of the

videos.title: Introducing the 2023 Prairie Burn 100
videos.description: The annual Prairie Burn 100 gravel bike ride fundraiser featuring 25, 50 and 100 mile loops around Grinnell, Iowa will take place again on Saturday, June 10, 2023. NEW this year is an added 5K Fun Run. Register today and make sure you stay in the loop by signing up for our emails or follow us on Facebook and Instagram! https://www.prairieburn100.com/

videos.title: Prairie Burn 100 Gravel Bike Ride Fundraiser
videos.description:
The Prairie Burn 100 is about staying active and enjoying the great outdoors. With routes spanning 25, 50 and 100 miles, you don’t have to be a pro gravel cyclist to participate. The event also helps to fund programs of Imagine Grinnell, a non-profit organization supporting a healthy and sustainable Grinnell community. Sign up for the annual Prairie Burn 100 gravel bike ride fundraiser, starting at 7am on June 11, 2022 in Grinnell, Iowa and bring the whole family for activities taking place in Central Park throughout the day. Activities include:

Yoga in the Park
Family bike ride
Youth art activity

More info - https://www.prairieburn100.com/
Learn more - https://www.bikereg.com/prairie-burn

NEW this year is an added 5K Fun Run. Register today and make sure you stay in the loop by signing up for our emails or follow us on Facebook and Instagram! https://www.prairieburn100.com/

videos.title: Introducing the 2026 Prairie Burn 100 | June 6, 2026
videos.description: On June 6, 2026, get ready to join our annual gravel bike ride – with routes spanning 25, 50 and 100 kilometers – and a 5K/3K Fun Run centered in Grinnell, Iowa. Mark your calendars and be sure to sign up for emails for updates on event specifics like food vendors, music and family-friendly activities!
